Agency: Alaska Division of Banking and Securities

Company: Quicken Loans, Inc. and One Reverse Mortgage, LLC
Description: Quicken Loans, Inc. and One Reverse Mortgage, LLC, independent companies owned by a common parent, agreed to pay a total of $250,000 in settlement of allegations they failed to comply with state and federal statutes as required by mortgage lenders, particularly failure to report data required under the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act.

Agency: Washington State Department of Financial Institutions

Company: Rocket Mortgage, LLC fka Quicken Loans, LLC
Description: Rocket Mortgage agreed to pay a total of $500,000 to the participating states in settlement of allegations the company's advertising and marketing practices violated mortgage lender regulations.

Company: Rocket Mortgage, LLC fka Quicken Loans, LLC
Agency: Washington State Department of Financial Institutions
